Luna is one of the main characters of The Strongest Tank's Labyrinth Raids.


Advertisement
History
Luna is an illegally made homunculus who was rescued and taken in by Rud. She has a rare ability called [Identify] which allows her to see the skills of others. Her name Luna was given to her by Rud as she didn't have a name when they met.

Appearance
She has waist-length white hair, blue eyes and due to being a homunculus has a gem in the center of her chest.

Personality
Luna is different than most homunculi as she is able to express emotions. Luna is initially shy around others although part of the reason for her shyness is because due to the distrust and mistreatment of homunculi by some people she is nervous around them due to the possibility that they might discover what she is and treat her differently due to her species. She also gets embarrassed easily.

Gallery

Trivia
Perhaps due to being a homunculus, Luna is able to quickly learn what she is taught.
